data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Sitapur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Sitapur.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, let those from the 49,324 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 4,484,000 citizens of the the county of Sitapur.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Sitapur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

location.name: Sitapur
